dtl


Class diagrams for DTL.

These diagrams were generously contributed by Roberto Modolo. (Many thanks!!!). We have presented the diagrams in three formats: a rich textfile format and an SVG format for resizable snapshots of the diagrams and as Rational Rose 2002 .mdl files for a more detailed view of the classes.

  • Download complete set as a zip file (1.5 MB)..
  • Top level diagram
